17 constexpr std::size_t dynamic_extent = std::numeric_limits<std::size_t>::max();
18 
19 namespace detail
20 {
21 
22 template <typename T, std::size_t Extent>
23 struct SpanStorage
24 {
25  SpanStorage()
26  {}
27 
28  SpanStorage(T* data, std::size_t) :
29  m_data(data)
30  {}
31 
32  T* m_data = nullptr;
33  static constexpr std::size_t m_size = Extent;
34 };
35 
36 template <typename T>
37 struct SpanStorage<T, dynamic_extent>
38 {
39  SpanStorage()
40  {}
41 
42  SpanStorage(T* data, std::size_t size) :
43  m_data(data), m_size(size)
44  {}
45 
46  T* m_data = nullptr;
47  std::size_t m_size = 0;
48 };
49 
50 } // namespace detail

58 template <typename T, std::size_t Extent = dynamic_extent>
59 class Span
60 {
61 public:
62  using element_type = T;
63  using value_type = typename std::remove_cv<T>::type;
64  using size_type = std::size_t;
65  using difference_type = std::ptrdiff_t;
66  using pointer = T*;
67  using const_pointer = const T*;
68  using reference = T&;
69  using iterator = pointer;
70  using const_iterator = const_pointer;
71  using reverse_iterator = std::reverse_iterator<iterator>;
72  using const_reverse_iterator = std::reverse_iterator<const_iterator>;
73 
74  static constexpr size_type extent = Extent;
75 
79  template <size_type ext = Extent,
80  typename std::enable_if<(ext == 0 || ext == dynamic_extent), int>::type = 0>
81  constexpr Span() noexcept
82  {}
83 
91  constexpr Span(pointer first, size_type count) :
92  m_storage(first, count)
93  {}
94 
102  constexpr Span(pointer first, pointer last) :
103  m_storage(first, static_cast<size_t>(last - first))
104  {}
105 
111  template <size_type N, size_type ext = Extent,
112  typename std::enable_if<(ext == dynamic_extent || ext == N), int>::type = 0>
113  constexpr Span(element_type(&arr)[N]) noexcept :
114  m_storage(arr, N)
115  {}
116 
122  template <typename U, size_type N, size_type ext = Extent,
123  typename std::enable_if<(ext == dynamic_extent || ext == N) &&
124  std::is_convertible<U(*)[], T(*)[]>::value, int>::type = 0>
125  constexpr Span(std::array<U, N>& arr) noexcept :
126  m_storage(arr.data(), arr.size())
127  {}
128 
134  template <typename U, size_type N, size_type ext = Extent,
135  typename std::enable_if<(ext == dynamic_extent || ext == N) &&
136  std::is_convertible<const U(*)[], T(*)[]>::value, int>::type = 0>
137  constexpr Span(const std::array<U, N>& arr) noexcept :
138  m_storage(arr.data(), arr.size())
139  {}
140 
146  template <typename U, typename ALLOC, size_type ext = Extent,
147  typename std::enable_if<(ext == dynamic_extent) &&
148  std::is_convertible<U(*)[], T(*)[]>::value, int>::type = 0>
149  constexpr Span(std::vector<U, ALLOC>& vec) :
150  m_storage(vec.data(), vec.size())
151  {}
152 
158  template <typename U, typename ALLOC, size_type ext = Extent,
159  typename std::enable_if<(ext == dynamic_extent) &&
160  std::is_convertible<const U(*)[], T(*)[]>::value, int>::type = 0>
161  constexpr Span(const std::vector<U, ALLOC>& vec) :
162  m_storage(vec.data(), vec.size())
163  {}
164 
170  template <typename U, size_type N,
171  typename std::enable_if<(Extent == N || Extent == dynamic_extent) &&
172  std::is_convertible<U(*)[], T(*)[]>::value, int>::type = 0>
173  constexpr Span(const Span<U, N>& s) noexcept :
174  m_storage(s.data(), s.size())
175  {}
176 
177  Span(const Span& other) noexcept = default;
178  Span& operator=(const Span& other) noexcept = default;
179 
185  constexpr iterator begin() const noexcept
186  {
187  return data();
188  }
189 
195  constexpr iterator end() const noexcept
196  {
197  return data() + size();
198  }
199 
205  constexpr reverse_iterator rbegin() const noexcept
206  {
207  return reverse_iterator(end());
208  }
209 
215  constexpr reverse_iterator rend() const noexcept
216  {
217  return reverse_iterator(begin());
218  }
219 
225  constexpr reference front() const
226  {
227  return data()[0];
228  }
229 
235  constexpr reference back() const
236  {
237  return data()[size() - 1];
238  }
239 
246  constexpr reference operator[](size_type idx) const
247  {
248  return data()[idx];
249  }
250 
256  constexpr pointer data() const noexcept
257  {
258  return m_storage.m_data;
259  }
260 
266  constexpr size_type size() const noexcept
267  {
268  return m_storage.m_size;
269  }
270 
276  constexpr size_type size_bytes() const noexcept
277  {
278  return size() * sizeof(element_type);
279  }
280 
286  constexpr bool empty() const noexcept
287  {
288  return size() == 0;
289  }
290 
296  template <size_type Count>
297  constexpr Span<element_type, Count> first() const
298  {
299  static_assert(Count <= Extent, "Requested number of characters out of range.");
300  return Span<element_type, Count>(data(), Count);
301  }
302 
309  constexpr Span<element_type, dynamic_extent> first(size_type Count) const
310  {
311  return Span<element_type, dynamic_extent>(data(), Count);
312  }
313 
319  template <size_type Count>
320  constexpr Span<element_type, Count> last() const
321  {
322  static_assert(Count <= Extent, "Requested number of characters out of range.");
323  return Span<element_type, Count>(data() + (size() - Count), Count);
324  }
325 
332  constexpr Span<element_type, dynamic_extent> last(size_type Count) const
333  {
334  return Span<element_type, dynamic_extent>(data() + (size() - Count), Count);
335  }
336 
337  template <size_type Offset, size_type Count>
338  using SubspanReturnType =
339  Span<T, Count != dynamic_extent ? Count : (Extent != dynamic_extent ? Extent - Offset
340  : dynamic_extent)>;
341 
347  template <size_type Offset, size_type Count = dynamic_extent>
348  constexpr SubspanReturnType<Offset, Count> subspan() const
349  {
350  static_assert((Extent == dynamic_extent) ||
351  (Offset <= Extent && (Count == dynamic_extent || Offset + Count <= Extent)),
352  "Requested number of characters out of range.");
353  return SubspanReturnType<Offset, Count>(data() + Offset,
354  Count != dynamic_extent ? Count : size() - Offset);
355  }
356 
364  constexpr Span<element_type, dynamic_extent> subspan(size_type Offset,
365  size_type Count = dynamic_extent) const
366  {
367  return Span<element_type, dynamic_extent>(data() + Offset,
368  Count == dynamic_extent ? size() - Offset : Count );
369  }
370 
371 private:
372  detail::SpanStorage<T, Extent> m_storage;
373 };
374
